title: More by Calibold
content:
[[module CSS]]

.more-by-calibold .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a, .more-by-calibold .collapsible-block-folded a {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.more-by-calibold {
    font-size: 75%;
}

.more-by-calibold .page-rate-widget-box {
    font-size: 133%;
}

.page-rate-widget-box {
    margin-right: 0px;
}

[[/module]]

[[div class="more-by-calibold"]]

[[=]]

[[module Rate]]

[[collapsible show="+ More by Calibold +" hide="- More by Calibold -"]]

**[[size 125%]][[[Calibri Bold's Mega Cool Author Page|Calibold's Mega Cool Author Page]]][[/size]]**

**-- SCP Articles --**

[[module ListPages created_by="Calibold" separate="no" category="-fragment" tags="+scp -co-authored" perPage="250"]]
%%title_linked%% -- %%content{4}%%
[[/module]]

**-- Tales --**

[[module ListPages created_by="Calibold" separate="no" category="-fragment" tags="+tale -co-authored" perPage="250"]]
%%title_linked%%
[[/module]]

**-- GoI Formats --**

%%title_linked%%

**-- Other --**

[[/module]]
